Content: I noticed that I win less than expected when increase the odds. For example for odds 5 I get result not fit the 3 sigmas which have a 0.3% probability

Author: jl777c#5810

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think it has to do with diff calculation: https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Difficulty

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Just add more 0 in case of increased odds?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: i think to convert the hash to a difficulty and then divide one by the odds will do the trick

Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
And this is a pushing monkey.sh script which I've used: 
```
BANANA=0
while [ $BANANA -lt 60 ]; do
./place_bets.sh
sleep 60
let BANANA=BANANA+1
done
```

Content: It's better to combine all in one script for sure I think üòÉ

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @jl777c if you have advice to avoid the `EVAL_FAUCET Invalid: faucet is only for brand new addresses` error in my tests, that would be helpful. I read the code that generates the error but I don't quite understand

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: the üåÖ is coming, so I should probably sleep

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: only way i know is, you need to restart the daemon with different pubkey and imprort the privkey (make sure your address has 0 tx of any kind) and use `faucetget`

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: that seems pretty inconvenient

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: both manually and in our tests

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: this was to discourage faucet leechers

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: well, we could turn off that check in regtest mode, is one option. which has pros and cons

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: it made my passing test suite fail, and getting around it requires a lot of work

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: best ROI is to disable that check in regtest mode. Which makes sense, in regtest, we control all nodes => no need to worry about evil faucet leeches

Author: SHossain#0007
Content: yes, you are right

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: some pedantic testing person might argue "then it makes it hard to test that particular evil faucet leech condition in regtest mode"

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: they are correct
